Quiz_Details: The Quiz is all about the Life & Works of Dr. Jose Rizal

Quiz_Questions.question: ______ ______ a tall girl with regal bearing was courted by Rizal while staying at Dona Concha Leyvas house in Intramuros
She was a pretty girl tende budding flower with indly wistful eyes
Rizal submitted a poem entitled A __ _______ ______ and won first price
______ - people dancing in the streets during procession in honor of the miraculous Birhen de los Dores
